description: This Java source file defines a servlet filter class 'AppAuthUserFilter' that extracts the user authentication ID from an HTTP request header 'X-Auth-Id' and sets it into a request context holder. It logs the incoming user ID and ensures the context is cleared after processing.

classes.name: AppAuthUserFilter
classes.description: A servlet filter that retrieves the 'X-Auth-Id' header from incoming HTTP requests and sets it into the request context.

methods.name: doFilter
methods.description: Processes incoming requests to extract the user ID from headers, logs it, and manages the request context lifecycle.
